Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based conjugated polymers used for polymer solar cells , demonstrating the great potential of spirobifluorene moiety as an electron - donating unit for the construction of main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymers for high performance polymer solar cells .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene |
| conjugated polymers |
| polymer solar cells |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, without any modifications or corrections.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "polymer solar cells" - This is a broader term that refers to a type of solar cell, rather than a specific material name.
* "main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers" - This is a description of a type of polymer structure, rather than a specific material name.
